name: FANGQUEST ⚔🐼🐶🐷🦁
description:
A dumb FR (parce que fangquest ça fait croc-quête tmtc Raymond Devos tremble stp) rpg made during a free trial week-end featuring nekomimi, easy battles and very bad humor :o) // 

Charadesign is generated but I like my rendition of them so please don't steal :^)) and have fun !

Cover art by Biya
